document_data.name: Narlgathra
document_data.mainbody: 'Narlgathra''' was a venerable{{Cite dragon/Cormanthor: War Amidst the Trees|71}}
document_data.Activities: Narlgathra laired in the abandoned temple to [[Aumarathar]] the Greater Dragon. Inside existed a [[gate]] to the [[Thunder Peaks]]
